SUMMARY.TITLE: Professional Summary
SUMMARY.CONTENT: Full Stack Engineer with 3+ years of experience in system architecture, partner integrations, and cross-border enterprise solutions. Proven track record of designing polyglot microservices platforms, migrating data architectures (relational → NoSQL), and integrating with external partners (DHL, FedEx, SAP) compliant with industry standards (DCSA). Experienced in making architectural decisions for multinational deployments, coordinating across distributed teams, and driving operational efficiency improvements.

JOB1.ACHIEVEMENT1: Built local engineering team from scratch (3-5 members) under strict Apple ISM security policies where dependency packages required weeks of approval; established remote development workflow to China HQ as interim solution
JOB1.ACHIEVEMENT2: Architected polyglot microservices platform to resolve development bottlenecks: proposed K3s + Istio service mesh architecture enabling local teams to build new services (FastAPI, Go) independently from legacy Spring Cloud core — MVP deployed, reducing dependency on China HQ remote access
JOB1.ACHIEVEMENT3: Led system internationalization from China to India: overcame challenges of Chinese-only interfaces, fragmented technical documentation, and outdated IP/config records that didn't match production reality — leveraged internal AI Agent to translate and consolidate scattered docs into systematic knowledge base
JOB1.ACHIEVEMENT4: Established GitLab CI/CD pipelines for containerized deployments — reducing deployment time from days to hours
JOB1.ACHIEVEMENT5: Serve as technical bridge between China development team and India operations, facilitating cross-timezone collaboration across Taiwan, India, and China

JOB2.ACHIEVEMENT1: Participated in weekly DCSA standards meetings with the world's 9 largest ocean carriers (75% of global container trade); contributed to Booking and B/L API specification development — standards now adopted industry-wide
JOB2.ACHIEVEMENT2: Developed Evergreen Developer Portal for enterprise customers (IKEA, Volvo) and freight forwarders to self-service integrate shipping APIs — reduced partner onboarding time by enabling direct API access
JOB2.ACHIEVEMENT3: Built container verification API integrating automated measurement systems to validate weight/volume against customer declarations — eliminated manual checking process, reducing verification time from hours to seconds
JOB2.ACHIEVEMENT4: Gathered requirements from external partners, translated business needs into technical specs; utilized Kafka for event-driven processing and Oracle for reliable data flow

JOB3.ACHIEVEMENT1: Transformed manual shipping workflow into automated solution: warehouse staff previously created shipping labels one-by-one on carrier websites; designed mobile workstation that scans package barcodes → calls carrier APIs → auto-prints labels — reduced processing time by 30%
JOB3.ACHIEVEMENT2: Unified multi-carrier integration (DHL, FedEx, local Taiwan carriers) using design patterns into single interface; external teams now integrate once instead of building separate connections for each carrier — reduced integration effort for downstream teams
JOB3.ACHIEVEMENT3: Architected data model migration from relational (MS SQL) to document-based (MongoDB): packaging data restructured into nested documents for single-query retrieval — improved API response time by 40%
JOB3.ACHIEVEMENT4: Designed MongoDB sharding strategy by region/factory, enabling horizontal scaling and data locality for multi-site operations
JOB3.ACHIEVEMENT5: Integrated MediaTek DaVinci AI platform to build chat assistant for real-time freight cost inquiries — enabled non-technical users to get quotes without manual lookup
JOB3.ACHIEVEMENT6: Migrated legacy VB.NET/.NET Framework to .NET Core microservices with API Gateway and Jenkins CI/CD — reduced deployment cycle from weeks to days
